Subject: NEA + NAM Upgrade
Description:
Hi Team, PGC is currently running NEA v11.5 & was suggested they upgrade to 11.6 by Kent Tuominen. They also have a problem that every time they try to open NEA, they have to reboot the app server before it will successfully connect to SQL and launch. Please reach out to Nooshin and Will Addis to schedule an upgrade.

Nooshin's email: nourahizadeh@co.pg.md.us 
William's email: wtaddis@co.pg.md.us
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom

Upgrade from StealthAudit to NEA 11.6

Cause

Proactive Upgrade

Resolution

Performed the upgrade process using the steps presented in the documentation below:

Enterprise Auditor Core Upgrade Instructions (netwrix.com)

Created a new default storage profile for the NEA console using the service account as the Windows authentication to resolve access issues with the current SQL authentication account due to not having the credentials. Gave the service account full dbo rights to the Stealthudit database. Installed the AIC using the service account.
